snippet: What is the Libor? Jon Stewart said the name evokes "the mythical half wild boar-half lion that was rumored to have killed Achilles' brother Jimmy the Greek."
abstract: What is the Libor? Jon Stewart said the name evokes "the mythical half wild boar-half lion that was rumored to have killed Achilles' brother Jimmy the Greek."

headline.main: The Daily Show Explains the Libor
